title: Man arrested in shooting of two teenagers in Stafford
content:
A Stafford County man faces charges after being accused of shooting two 15-year-old boys early Wednesday morning, according to Sheriff’s Office spokeswoman M.C. Morris Moncure.
The juveniles were transported to a local hospital. They were able to give a statement to police, but no other information about their condition was released.
